DataElement.preferredName: Care Team Member National Provider Identifier Access PCORnet CDM Indicator Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The role of an individual healthcare provider as a constituent part of a group.:A unique identification number for health care services, supplies, and equipment providers in the United States.  NPI is assigned for use in all administrative and financial transactions specified by HIPAA. NPI is issued by the National Plan and Provider Enumeration System (NPPES) and is 10-position, all-numeric identification number with no embedded intelligence._The right to obtain or make use of or take advantage of something (as services or membership); the right to enter.  Also, an act or means of approaching.:An individual healthcare provider that is a part of a care team._A unique identification number for health care services, supplies, and equipment providers in the United States.  NPI is assigned for use in all administrative and financial transactions specified by HIPAA. NPI is issued by the National Plan and Provider Enumeration System (NPPES) and is 10-position, all-numeric identification number with no embedded intelligence._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: A data model designed to standardize PCORnet data.
An individual healthcare provider that is a part of a care team.

A unique identification number for health care services, supplies, and equipment providers in the United States.  NPI is assigned for use in all administrative and financial transactions specified by HIPAA. NPI is issued by the National Plan and Provider Enumeration System (NPPES) and is 10-position, all-numeric identification number with no embedded intelligence.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

DataElement.origin: PCORNet CDM:The Patient-Centered Outcomes Research Network Common Data Model
